text: te samayane yada karo jyare allaha tamane unghadi rahyo hato, potana taraphathi santi apava mate ane tamara para akasa manthi pani varasavi rahyo hato ke te pani vade tamane pavitra kari de ane tamara (hrdayo) manthi setani vicarane nasta kari de ane tamara hrdayone majabuta kari de ane tamara paga adaga kari de
